name: MULTI PONG
description:
Pong with a twist. Play multiple tables at once.

Choose the number of tables and control all your paddles with the same movement. You need to have exceptional coordination to keep blocking the balls on all the tables to win the game. There are several modes of playing, be it a single player against AI, local multi-player of 2 people, or a local tournament mode upto 8 people.

Recommended to play drunk to get maximum fun!

STREAMERS / LPERS: Feel free to create, post, and monetize videos of this game.

Bugs reports, can be sent to support@pksunkara.com

Questions, comments, etc. can be sent to contact@pksunkara.com
